name: Lights Out on Pluto
description:
You wake up in the mess hall, with a wicked headache and some very dead crewmates. The Emergency light system must have taken a hit in the chaos, because the lights are switching on and off in some sort of loop. Not good. For you, or that pesky headache. To top it all off, somewhere, lurking in the shadows, is the creature that started all of this mess. Your only chance to survive, is to search the corpses of your fallen friends for anything that can even the odds.

Win Conditions:

  1. Torch the Creature by burning it 3 times with the flamethrower. *(NOTE Creature does not take damage while fleeing after hit)
  2. Use the switch in the helm to seal off the airlock doors, then the switch right outside the airlock to blast it into space.

CONTROLS

  • Movement: WASD (keyboard), left stick (controller)
  • Sprint: Shift (keyboard), left trigger (controller)
  • Interact: E (keyboard) X, (controller)
  • Fire Flamethrower: left click (keyboard), right trigger (controller)
  • Exit Game: good ol’ alt+f4

This game is a Ludum Dare 47 Jam submission. To rate it, please follow this link: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/lights-out-on-pluto

NOTE: A game-breaking fix was added to this game that disabled the usage of SteamVR on 2020-10-07.
